question:
This question is a part of The 5 lb. Book of GRE Practice Problems (2nd Ed.) - VERBAL
Peculiarly enough, Shakespeare has been often (i) ______ as the best English language playwright, and often (ii) ______ as a man lacking the education to write those plays.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) crowned
(D) demonized
(B) stigmatized
(E) dismissed
(C)  castigated
(F) deified
